Build-Depends-Indep: dh-python, python3-sphinx, python3-sphinx-rtd-theme, python3-serpent <!nocheck>, python3-setuptools, python3-cloudpickle (>= 0.4.0), python3-dill (>= 0.2.6), python3-msgpack (>= 0.5.2) <!nocheck>, python3-pytest <!nocheck>
Description: distributed object middleware for Python (RPC) Pyro (PYthon Remote Object) is an easy to use and powerful distributed object system for Python. In a distributed object system, clients send requests to distant servers, which owns the remote objects. Pyro simplifies a lot the creation of clients and servers, and has among its features: - dynamic and static proxies for all remote method invocations, - a naming service which keeps record of the location of objects, - mobile objects support: clients and servers can pass objects around, - exceptions that occur in the remote object is raised on the client too, - multithreaded server support to handle multiple requests simultaneously.
Package-List: pyro5-doc deb doc optional arch=all pyro5-examples deb python optional arch=all python3-pyro5 deb python optional arch=all
